contents:
There's no cover-up. The Chinese government is committed to handling the situation with absolute transparency and openness. Any suggestion otherwise is a lie, a malicious lie concocted by foreign powers jealous of China's success under the leadership of our glorious party! --耿爽(手動doge頭)
武警：同志，這是你的最後一次警告，立即調轉車頭按原路返回，否則後果自負。
